name: Arctic Blaze
description: Arctic Blaze is a unique hot sauce crafted to bring the unexpected heat in a dazzling white color. Infused with creamy coconut milk and tangy lime, it combines the fierce heat of white ghost peppers with a smooth, velvety base. A hint of garlic and a touch of ginger elevate the flavor profile, making Arctic Blaze not just a feast for the eyes but a tantalizing experience for the palate. Perfect for those who seek a refined heat with an exotic twist, whether drizzled on seafood, stirred into soups, or added to salads. A true adventure in a bottle!
